divs: Sighting DetailsIt was roughly 9:10 we had just gotten home from picking up gift wrap and a local discount store and we were unloading it from the tuck when my husband noticed somthing in the sky he thought might have been a satalite, after a few seconds of observation we realized it was moving to fast to be a satalite and much to slow to be a air plane or helicopter, a few seconds later we noted that it was changing from orange to red to white and it seemed to stop moving a few seconds later it seemed as if to wobble up and down and then it completly disiapered to this day I still dont know what the light was my only regret was not using my husbands cell phone to get photos )o:
